definition: To obtain or achieve something through effort, skill, or perseverance, often referring to acquiring knowledge, skills, or a specific status. It is commonly used in the context of personal growth, academic achievements, or professional advancements.

examples.german: Ich möchte mehr Informationen über das Thema erlangen.
examples.english: I want to gain more information about the topic.

examples.german: Er hat einen hohen Bildungsgrad erlangt.
examples.english: He has achieved a high level of education.

examples.german: Die Firma konnte einen neuen Kunden erlangen.
examples.english: The company was able to acquire a new customer.

examples.german: Sie versucht, ihre Unabhängigkeit zu erlangen.
examples.english: She is trying to attain her independence.

examples.german: Er hat viel Ruhm und Anerkennung erlangt.
examples.english: He has gained a lot of fame and recognition.
